General.Name: Shenzhen Yan Tian Port Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Yan Tian Port Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the road and bridge, port, and warehousing and logistics businesses in China. It is involved in the development and operation of development and operation of wharves; loading and unloading, and transportation of cargo; construction and operation of port supporting transportation, storage, and industrial facilities; construction and operation of port supporting living service facilities; and container repair, trading, and cargo and technology import and export services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China. Shenzhen Yan Tian Port Holdings Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shenzhen Port Group Co., Ltd.
